text: Hi all! Happy to be here and wanted to introduce myself. I’m CTO of a small gaming and innovation studio named Tech Levitate. We are focused on building games and gamification solutions using emerging technology. I’m new to using HubSpot and planned to explore using the API to integrate with Unity3D and/or the Mindbody platform. Looking forward to learning more and meeting a few of you soon!
Hi Jodessiah! welcome to this channel!:wave-yeti:

Reminder: Welcome to our developer community. If someone helps you out by answering a question. please pay it forward by helping someone else out in the community - when you know an answer. Ask questions in the relevant channels, our community is very active and will see it. We have a chatbot that can answer commonly asked questions, feel free to reach out to it by DMing `@DevHelp`
